title: Kimberly Sayer Ultra Light Facial Moisturizer Spf30
description: For Oily and Acne Prone Skin This lightweight, protective day cream is easily absorbed and won't clog pores or cause breakouts. It contains Lemon Oil to detoxify the skin, minimize oil production and dry up acne and zits. Contains organic sunblocks to protect the skin from harmful UV rays. Ideal for use under make-up.

title: AVALON ORGANICS, CoQ10 Perfecting Facial Toner - 8 oz
